channel.title: [PI] 317 Shop Error? [PI]
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape,
In ActionHandler.java i found:
[code]/*case 8275: c.getShops().openShop(48); c.sendMessage("You currently got <col=255>"+c.magePoints+"</col> Slayer Points");*/[/code] (magePoints = SlayerPoints)
But when i clicked Duradel [8275] it asks if you want a Slayer Task.. but it doesn't show any shops, nor when you click 'Trade' or 'Rewards'. So I changed the Duradel ID [8275] to the Vannaka ID [1597], and I click Vannaka, it doesn't show any shops either...
Do I have to change something somewhere else? If yes, then where?
I think this isn't that hard for most of you guys here, so I hope you can help me.
Greetings, Terrible.

item.title: [PI] 317 Shop Error? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

[quote="+tyco+, post:2, topic:454249"]The case isnt open its been closed try this :D.

case 8275: c.getShops().openShop(48); c.sendMessage("You currently got <col=255>"+c.magePoints+"</col> Slayer Points")

Need more help PM me dude :D[/quote]

Thanks bro it worked ++ !

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 317 Shop Error? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

Hey MoparScape,

In ActionHandler.java i found:

/*case 8275: c.getShops().openShop(48); c.sendMessage("You currently got <col=255>"+c.magePoints+"</col> Slayer Points");*/
(magePoints = SlayerPoints)

But when i clicked Duradel [8275] it asks if you want a Slayer Task… but it doesn’t show any shops, nor when you click ‘Trade’ or ‘Rewards’. So I changed the Duradel ID [8275] to the Vannaka ID [1597], and I click Vannaka, it doesn’t show any shops either…

Do I have to change something somewhere else? If yes, then where?

I think this isn’t that hard for most of you guys here, so I hope you can help me.

Greetings, Terrible.

Read full topic
